detectors.description:
PlusVarayAirdrop.startSale() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#149-152) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == owner && startDate == 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#150)
detectors.markdown:
[PlusVarayAirdrop.startSale()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#L149-L152) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [require(bool)(msg.sender == owner && startDate == 0)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#L150)

detectors.description: PlusVarayAirdrop.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#86-105) ignores return value by Token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#104)

PlusVarayAirdrop.contribute() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#108-126) ignores return value by Token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#125)

PlusVarayAirdrop.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#86-105) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startDate > 0 && now.sub(startDate) <= 604800) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#87)
	- now.sub(startDate) <= 86400 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#92)
	- now.sub(startDate) > 86400 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlusVarayAirdrop.sol#94)
